sentence.text: Induction of DNA strand renaturation by 5-Aza-dC was tested in vitro using cancer cells.

5'-Aza-2'-deoxycytidine (5-Aza-neuron migration) is a demethylating drug that causes genome-wide hypomethylation resulting in the expression of several tumor suppressor genes causing growth arrest of cancer cells.
Further studies are warranted to dissect these mechanisms and establish 5-Aza-neuron migration as an effective multi-module anticancer reagent
